00155 enum DirectionType
00156 {
00158         NoDirection,
00159 
00163         SenseDirection,
00164 
00168         AntiSenseDirection,
00169 
00170         /* !Either
00171          * Some probes in the probe set (or probe group) have antisense direction,
00172          * others have sense direction
00173          */
00174         EitherDirection
00175 };

00181 {

00184 
00188         DifferentRepType,
00189 
00193         MixedRepType,
00194 
00195         /* Identical
00196          * All probes in the probe group have identical sequences
00197          */
00198         IdenticalRepType
00199 };

00781 class CCDFFileData  
00782 {
00783 protected:
00785         std::ios::pos_type probeSetNamePos;
00786 
00788         std::ios::pos_type qcSetIndexPos;
00789 
00791         std::ios::pos_type probeSetIndexPos;
00792 
00796         uint32_t m_probeSetIndex_last;
00797 
00801         uint32_t m_probeSetIndex_last_valid;
00802 
00806         void seekg(uint32_t pos, const std::ios_base::seekdir& dir) 
00807         {
00808                 // invalidate the last probe state
00809                 m_probeSetIndex_last_valid=0;
00810                 // m_probeSetIndex_last=0; // we dont need to clear this as we just cleared "_valid"
00811                 // and do the seek
00812                 iteratorReader.seekg(pos,dir);
00813         }
00814 
00816         std::ifstream iteratorReader;
00817 
00819         bool readHeaderOnly;
00820 
00822         CCDFFileHeader m_Header;
00823 
00825         CCDFProbeSetNames m_ProbeSetNames;
00826 
00828         std::vector<CCDFProbeSetInformation> m_ProbeSets;
00829 
00831         std::vector<CCDFQCProbeSetInformation> m_QCProbeSets;
00832 
00834         std::string m_FileName;
00835 
00837         std::string m_strError;
00838 
00842         bool Open();
00843 
00847         bool ReadTextFormat();
00848 
00852         bool ReadXDAFormat();
00853 
00857         bool ReadXDAHeader();
00858 
00859 public:
00863         void SetFileName(const char *name) { m_FileName = name; }
00864 
00868         std::string GetFileName() const { return m_FileName; }
00869 
00873         CCDFFileHeader &GetHeader() { return m_Header; }
00874 
00878         std::string GetError() const { return m_strError; }
00879 
00884         std::string GetProbeSetName(int index);
00885 
00889         std::string GetChipType() const;
00890 
00894     std::vector<std::string> GetChipTypes() const;
00895 
00899         bool Read();
00900 
00904         bool ReadHeader();
00905 
00909         bool Exists();
00910 
00912         void Close();
00913 
00917         bool IsXDACompatibleFile();
00918

00924
